page.title: 16My Family in 1985.
page.content: My Dad is thirty eight years old, he is a signal man for British Rail, he works at Baschurch signal box, he has been there for about four weeks after moving from Church Stretton. My Mum is thirty seven years old she works at the Tesco Superstore on Featherbed Lane. I have two sisters, Sharon is nearly eighteen years of age she works at Laura Ashley in Meole Brace, this is a clothes company although they also make textile fabric and wallpaper patterns. Paula is seventeen ans she is learning to drive so watch out if you are in the area when she has a driving lesson! She works at Dewhursts which is a butcher on the Riverside Shopping Centre she sells fruit on a separate counter to the meat.
